fake_or_hacked_id: Note: You can print and fill it out or type/handwrite in the same format (Language: English / Nepali or both).
2  Other Required Details with the Application (Mandatory):Documents/details to attach with your application
Copy of the applicant's Citizenship/National ID/Passport/Birth Certificate (for minors),
Related URLs, IDs, phone numbers, or email addresses of both the victim and the perpetrator,
If it's an email-related incident, include the email header (softcopy),
3  Submission Location/Method for Application with Required Details
You can submit it physically at the nearest District Police Office (or at the Bureau office in Bhotahity Kathmandu Valley if you are within the valley).
In case: Unable to present physically you can email all the details to cyberbureau@nepalpolice.gov.np
